name: Hasshaku-chan
nutshell:
(en-AU)
A young, 242cm tall Hachishaku-chan enrols.
(en-US)
A young, 8 foot tall girl enroles in her local school for her age.

hyperrefs:* Pixiv first chapter

DLSite Circle

note: initial cover is rotated to suit. Check covers to see original.

name: This Prince Is Lovesick
nutshell: All Yuer wanted was to find herself a groom, but she accidentally led four fiancés to their premature deaths… Fine, if no one wanted her, she could settle with being single forever. Still, dear Imperial Uncle, we have to talk about this. Next time you want to visit me in my room, could you please use the door? I can leave it open for you! “No, this is our secret rendezvous. It feels more romantic if I come in through the window…”

name: Second life of a Gangster
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Action,Psychological,Long Strip,Romance,Crime,Drama,School Life,Fantasy,Delinquents,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
Age 41, Oh Joong Seok. A man who did all kinds of misdeeds and put his life on the line for the organisation to gain the highest position. But who knew the end of his life would be so miserable… Joong Seok’s ‘virtuous living’ project starts now, one by one.


Original Webtoon <Naver>: Season 1 | Season 2




Official Traditional Chinese Translation


Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Indonesian Translation


Official Japanese Translation


Official Thai Translation

name: Aki
nutshell: Mahjong is all Nikaido Aki knew growing up. With her parents operating a Mahjong shop where people would gather to play the game, it served as a good time for Aki, her older sister Rumi and their family. But when their mother leaves them out of the blue, their father is forced to close the shop and he leaves Aki and Rumi with relatives. With no real goal in life and not even sure if she wants to continue on to high school, Aki has to figure out what she wants out of her life.

name: Touhou - Yume ～ you me (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Hijiri x Miko doujin.

name: November Gymnasium
nutshell:
A compilation of early one-shots by Moto Hagio. Includes the famous "November Gymnasium" as the leading one-shot.
Contains:


November Gymnasium (11月のギムナジウム, 11-gatsu no Gymnasium) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi in the November 1971 Issue
Description:
When a tough, rebellious Eric arrives at a German boarding school, there is one fellow student he hates: Thoma. Thoma bears a striking resemblance to Eric, but is gentle, delicate, and idolized by his classmates.


Snow Child (雪の子) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi's March 1971 Issue


The Home Where the Tower Is (塔のある家); ShoComi 1971 Issue #12


The Girl Who became a White Bird (白い鳥になった少女) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi's December 1971 Issue


The Flute of the White Boy in the White Forest (白き森白き少年の笛) - Serialized in ShoComi 1971 Issue #45 -
Note: Included in the French Moto Hagio Anthologie De la rêverie under the name ''Le petit flûtiste de la forêt blanche''


Bianca (ビアンカ); Serialized in Weekly Shojo Friend Zoukan's July 7th, 1970 Special Issue.
Note: One-shot included in the English only compilation A Drunken Dream and Other Stories


The Yukata Sewn in the Night (小夜の縫うゆかた) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi's October 1971 Issue


Autumn Journey (秋の旅) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi's May 1971 Issue
Note: One-shot included in the English only compilation A Drunken Dream and Other Stories


Poor Mama (かわいそうなママ, Kawaisou na Mama) - Serialized in Bessatsu ShoComi's May 1971 Issue
Description:
A man returns from a trip after hearing news about his former love's passing.

name: Eunsoo
nutshell: Eunsoo’s life is a fairy tale. She’s a ballerina living in New York and her romantic boyfriend just proposed to her with a huge diamond ring. So what if she didn’t get the lead role this time? All the other dancers are jealous of her perfect life, and that’s all that matters. But when Eunsoo receives a call saying her boyfriend committed suicide, her fairy tale quickly turns into a nightmare she can’t wake up from.

name: Oni no Shokuji wa Mendokusai
nutshell:
Kyo, a young man who lost his family, finds a man unconscious in front of his house and lets him rest in his house since he could get in trouble if he died there, but when the man wakes up he suddenly jumps at Kyo and says “Let me eat you…!!”
That man, Ren, was actually a demon!!!
He tells Kyo that if he doesn’t eat a human’s energy regularly he’ll disappear and that the most delicious energy comes from people who are having sex, so he asks Kyo to have sex with him, but his invitation is firmly rejected!
Kyo planned to kick him out as soon as possible, but since he didn’t have many opportunities to talk with someone, he decides to let him stay in his house.
Kyo was supposed to think that Ren was a nuisance, but he lived alone for so long that he started to have feelings for Ren during the lively days he spent with him. And so, Ren’s presence in his life got stronger by the day. However, Kyo had a reason that made it impossible for him to give Ren “delicious energy”.

name: Boku no Kirai na Otouto
nutshell: When their parents remarried, Shiina gained a stepbrother five years his junior, Kazuya. Kazuya is a picky eater and only eats the food prepared by Shiina, who is a chef. As Kazuya grew older, he became more and more distant, leaving Shiina feeling perplexed by the growing distance between them.

name: Onigiri Cat
nutshell:
A comic from the author's Twitter.
Judy Scans
The author decided to re-create the story to focus on other things rather than the Onigiri Cat. This has been canceled by the author.

name: Koshotengai no Hashihime
nutshell:
An adaption of the visual novel Koshotengai no Hashihime (古書店街の橋姫) or Hashihime of the Old Book Town.
Each chapter is an oneshot, featuring both gen and pairing stories.

name: Aien Catharsis
nutshell: Ryuuji, the young master of the Inamiya apothecary, finds himself intrigued by the blunt honesty displayed by his driver, Kondou. One day, he discovers the burning passion that Kondou holds for him after he snuck a peek at Kondou’s journal. But even after Kondou discovers that Ryuuji read his journal, his behavior doesn’t change, which leads Ryuuji to be extra self-conscious of that fact…

name: Muchuu ni Naru yo
nutshell:
Towa and Yamato are twins with very different personalities. Yamato is loud, outgoing, and regularly gets into fights, and Towa is quiet, studious, and always suffering the after effects of Yamato's actions as he's always being mistaken for his brother.
On his way home from school one day, Towa suddenly meets Mitsuru, a mysterious, young delinquent whilst being beaten up by the school gang who mistakes him for Yamato. But Mitsuru can tell them apart...

name: Roji Meikyuu no Rosie
nutshell:
A lavishly illustrated manga in which a young girl–guided by handsome monster boys–explores a mysterious maze of alleyways!
The Labyrinth: a world of never-ending streets and intertwined alleyways, where time and space are not what they seem. Those who wander here from other worlds find themselves with odd powers and even odder appearances. Curious and ever-cheerful Rosie lives in the Labyrinth with her inhuman family—cat-eared Chemin, timid Mur, and Kay, the animated doll—who act as her guides and guardians in this strange and mysterious world.

name: Futago no Goshisoku-sama
nutshell:
1-3. Hana Sakasemashou (Let the Flowers Bloom)
Yasukado and Yasutoki are twin brothers born as the heir and protector of their family's feudal household. When an assassination attempt is made on Yasukado, Yasutoki must do all he can to protect his beloved brother and lord.

Blissful Sin



Futago no Goshisoku-sama
An alternate story of Yasukado and Yasutoki in a modern world.


Suki ni Nattara!

name: Shoki Tanpenshuu
nutshell: A collection of oneshots.

name: Renai☆SLG
nutshell: Shibata Youichi is an ordinary highschooler, but one day he runs into a mysterious heroine! The cute girl knows his name, and (as in a stereotypical anime) she's an alien who needs him to help save her people! Soon enough, Youichi finds out that this situation was too good to be true… The girl, named Kyara, does represent aliens, but her people are actually interested in Japanese manga/anime/game culture. They want to use his home as a base and his brain as a measuring tool of the level of appeal of their heroines!

name: Tokyo Juliet
nutshell: Ayase Minori is a new student entering Houjou Designer's College. She has had her design "Daisy" stolen by a top-class designer Hinagata Eiji when she was 5 years old, and Minori had sworn to the fact that "I will not fall in love before I can beat Hinagata Eiji!" However, her meeting with Himemiya Akira almost made her forget her old vow… while Akira is Hinagata Eiji's only-son!

name: Croissantstars
nutshell: In a world populated with anthropomorphic pastries, breads, croissants, cookies and other pastries coexist in harmony in a world of sugar and yeast. What exciting adventures will we meet? If with Beastars you became furry, here you will become pansexual XD. Revelation manga of the year 2020 and winner of the famous Hatsumei award.

name: Legend of the Outcast Gai
nutshell: In this suspense action story, junior high school student Kudou Gai is framed for the murder of an elderly wealthy man Hirata Ryuuhou, and fights to prove his innocence and escape from the horrific rehabilitation facility called the Human Academy.

name: Kishin Kakka no Migawari Hanayome
nutshell: Tsukiko is a young woman who has been a sickly and frail child, and is treated as ‘a good for nothing.’ She becomes the replacement for her twin sister who was going to marry His Excellency, Kishi, a man who rose to become a Lieutenant General of the army at a young age. Due to his ruthlessness, he gained the nickname of ‘Demon God.’ She met him once before, and his kindness became the one thing that supported her. But instead of that kindness, he bluntly says, ‘if you can fulfill your duty and give birth to a boy that will become my successor, I will divorce you without making a fuss.’

name: Yokai Hunter - Mount Masho
nutshell: A collection of stories featuring unorthodox archaeologist Hieda Reijirou and his encounters with the unknown.

name: If You Do Not Obey Me
nutshell: Jiheon Jang, a businessman, falls in love at first sight in at a snooker game. Jiheon's unbearable desires forces him to spend the night together, but desperately runs away when he is revealed to be a violent and oppressive man. And one day after three years, the two will reunite in unexpected ways …

name: Poolside
nutshell: Yaoi Is Life: He wants to enjoy his summer vacation with his lover but a businessman’s vacation is too short…?!

name: Imitation
nutshell:
Maha is a member of the girl group, Tea Party. She became famous by imitating other popular stars and for this very reason, Ryoc, a member of the boy band, Sharks, holds a strong hatred towards her. However, as they continue to cross paths, his feelings towards Maha begin to change and their relationship develops into an unexpectedly sweet romance that they must now hide from everyone around them.
Official English translation on Comico's Pocket Comics app

name: Touhou - Tegami o Kakimashou (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Reimu x Yukari doujin.

name: Jueshi Zongzhu Ling Ling Xiao
nutshell: Betapa sepinya menjadi tak terkalahkan, terlalu kuat sama sekali tidak menyenangkan, tapi kota yang terlihat biasa-biasa saja itu menarik. Master sekte yang tak tertandingi turun gunung untuk kunjungan pribadi.
